services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Discover our comprehensive in-home nursing services, from specialized treatments to expert care for chronic conditions

treatments.sectionSubtitle: Evidence-based therapeutic interventions delivered with precision and compassion in your home

items.title: Post-Operative Recovery
items.description: Comprehensive post-surgical care to ensure smooth recovery and optimal healing outcomes

items.title: Mental Health Support
items.description: Compassionate psychiatric nursing care for anxiety, depression, and other mental health conditions

items.title: IV Therapy
items.description: Advanced intravenous treatments including hydration, nutrition, and medication administration

items.title: Pain Management
items.description: Multi-modal approaches to chronic pain relief and improved quality of life

items.title: Cardiac & Pulmonary Care
items.description: Specialized nursing for heart disease and respiratory conditions with continuous monitoring

items.title: Rehabilitation & Addiction
items.description: Supportive care for substance abuse recovery and long-term sobriety maintenance

items.title: Eating Disorders
items.description: Compassionate care and nutritional support for anorexia, bulimia, and related conditions

expertise.sectionSubtitle: Expert nursing care for complex chronic conditions requiring specialized knowledge and skills

items.title: Alzheimer's Disease
items.description: Memory care and cognitive support for Alzheimer's patients and their families

items.title: Parkinson's Disease
items.description: Specialized care for movement disorders and Parkinson's disease management

items.title: Oncology Care
items.description: Compassionate nursing support throughout cancer treatment and recovery

items.title: Diabetes Management
items.description: Comprehensive blood sugar monitoring, insulin administration, and lifestyle guidance

items.title: Stroke Recovery
items.description: Rehabilitation support and care for stroke survivors

items.title: Heart Disease
items.description: Cardiac nursing care for congestive heart failure and cardiovascular conditions

items.title: ALS (Lou Gehrig's Disease)
items.description: Specialized care for amyotrophic lateral sclerosis with focus on quality of life

items.title: Dementia Care
items.description: Patient-centered care for dementia and cognitive decline
